item.description: The Manchester Historic Association is pleased to be hosting the C-SPAN Civics Bus from 10 a.m. to 12:00 p.m.! Visitors will have the chance to tour the 45-foot bus that serves as a television production studio and a demonstration center. You can learn about the many resources C-SPAN offers, including the network's education website, C-SPAN Classroom, and a free membership service for educators with downloadable video clips. Also explore the C-SPAN Video Library and learn about C-SPAN's television coverage of national politics. This visit is sponsored by Comcast. ADMISSION IS FREE. RSVPS are requested, but not required.
item.how_to_find_us: The C-SPAN Civics Bus will be parked on the Commercial Street side of the building.
item.name: C-SPAN Civics Bus at the Millyard Museum
